main:keys.text:
1) Check that the internet works without VPN.
2) If the problem persists, request a new key from support @modern_1mctech

main:renew.text:
Subscription can be renewed through a manager or in your personal account.
If you don't have a payment link, write to support â€” we'll send it.

main:invite.text:
Open the bot @LockDown_VPN_Bbot â†’ Main â†’ Invite a friend.
Copy the invitation link and send it to the person.

install:ios.text: 1) Open the App Store and install the Happ app - installation link. 2) Copy your subscription in the "My Subscription" section 3) In the Happ app, tap "Paste from clipboard" 4) Congratulations, your subscription has been added! By tapping the "speedometer" icon you can check the connection speed with each location. Where the value is lower - that location works better at the moment 5) Select a location and tap connect.

install:android.text: 1) Install the app from Google Play - installation link. 2) Copy your subscription in the "My Subscription" section 3) In the Happ app, tap "Paste from clipboard" 4) Congratulations, your subscription has been added! By tapping the "speedometer" icon you can check the connection speed with each location. Where the value is lower - that location works better at the moment 5) Select a location and tap connect.

install:windows.text: 1) Install the app for Windows. - installation link 2) Copy your subscription in the "My Subscription" section 3) In the Happ app, click "Paste from clipboard" 4) Congratulations, your subscription has been added! By clicking the "speedometer" icon you can check the connection speed with each location. Where the value is lower - that location works better at the moment 5) Select a location and click connect.

install:macos.text: 1) Open the App Store and install the Happ app - installation link. 2) Copy your subscription in the "My Subscription" section 3) In the Happ app, tap "Paste from clipboard" 4) Congratulations, your subscription has been added! By tapping the "speedometer" icon you can check the connection speed with each location. Where the value is lower - that location works better at the moment 5) Select a location and tap connect.
